name: Installation Checklist
Details
Has the window/door installation been completed to standard?
Modules installed correctly?
Is interior and/or exterior sealants installation neat and continuous.
Is sill flashing installed per plans and as detailed in the shop drawings?
Is head flashing installed per plans and as detailed in the shop drawings?
Are all window and doors working?
Are all the hardware installed correctly?
Is the joinery free of scratches?
Is the joinery clean and tidy?
Hinge doors strikes adjusted and locking easily
Hinge doors and sliding doors - Bungs are fitted (every hole)
Sliding doors - panels are adjusted and locking easily
Sliding doors - Strikes are adjusted
End Caps Installed
Drains are not blocked
Glazing Checklist
Details
Glass installed with correct face to the outside
Wedge rubber complete
Removed label & Glass Spacer Pads
Box Fins Checklist
Details
Brackets installed to modules as per Shop Drawings
Brackets installed to Box fins as per Shop Drawings
Box Fin Spacing as per Shop Drawings
Box Fin Alignment completed
Are all bolts installed
